snippet: A federal judge ordered Reebok to buy back all the jerseys it made after Tebow was traded to the Jets from Denver last month.
abstract: Federal judge orders Reebok to buy back all jerseys it made after quarterback Tim Tebow was traded to New York Jets from Denver Broncos; Nike, exclusive licensee of NFL, filed lawsuit against Reebok after jerseys appeared in stores.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ordered Reebok to buy back all the jerseys it made after Tebow was traded to the Jets from Denver last month.

headline.seo: Reebok Ordered to Recall Tim Tebow Jets Jerseys
headline.main: Judge Orders Reebok to Recall Tebow Jerseys
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Reebok To Recall Tebow Jerseys
